code: import{TOGGLE_DROPDOWN,REMOVE_ITEM,CLEAR_CART_ITEM,NEW_ITEM}from"./carttypes";function toggleCartDropdown(){return{type:TOGGLE_DROPDOWN};}export var newItem=function newItem(item){return{type:NEW_ITEM,payload:item};};export var clerarCartItem=function clerarCartItem(item){return{type:CLEAR_CART_ITEM,payload:item};};export var removeItem=function removeItem(item){return{type:REMOVE_ITEM,payload:item};};export default toggleCartDropdown;
